results.title: Metformin Alleviates Epirubicin-Induced Endothelial Impairment by Restoring Mitochondrial Homeostasis
results.text_hl: In @CHEMICAL_Epirubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015251 @@@epirubicin@@@-treated cells, knockdown of @GENE_TFAM @GENE_397279 @@@TFAM@@@ counteracted the attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Chromosome_Breakage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019457 @@@DSB@@@ formation due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pretreatment, and inhibition of @DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@mitochondrial fragmentation@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Mdivi_1 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000723896 @@@Mdivi-1@@@ decreased @<m>DISEASE_Chromosome_Breakage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019457 @@@DSB@@@ formation but increased @GENE_TFAM @GENE_397279 @@@TFAM@@@ expression.

citations.NLM: Sun Q, Jia H, Cheng S, Wang Y, Wang J. Metformin Alleviates Epirubicin-Induced Endothelial Impairment by Restoring Mitochondrial Homeostasis Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Dec 25;24(1):. PMID: 36613786
